about_the_game:
THE PARASITEs - is an open-world survival horror set in an an abandoned corner, after the fall of a giant meteorite.

You are one of those lucky enough to survive the infection. Every time you try to go beyond the catastrophe, you somehow come back. Your task is to survive and get out of this trap. As time goes by, loneliness and the itch of the parasite begins to put more and more pressure not only on your body, but also on your psyche – can you survive in this nightmare?

There's no point waiting for help. All you have is a parasite that you have learned to coexist with. By chance, he rewarded you with superhuman strength and survival. Using this, you will have to learn on the go, build shelters, improve your character, create traps, make tools and weapons for hunting and self-defense. Remember about those who are less fortunate, your life is under threat all the time: at any moment you can be killed.

Key Features

  • The environment and situations affect the psyche of the heroine

  • Unstable harsh climate, radiation spots after the disaster, be careful

  • Explore the open world with breathing flora and fauna, go down into the dark tunnels for the best equipment, just do not forget to take a light source with you


  • A unique damage system, be careful, the infected tear not only your flesh but also your clothes to shreds

  • Dangerous and nimble creatures, be ready to run or fight if you don't want to lose a part of yourself


  • Chop down trees, break stones to build a small shelter or an impregnable fortress

  • Go in search of a robot loader, which will become an indispensable assistant for you in carrying heavy resources. Upgrade and repair it so that it will serve you to the end


  • Collect, grow food to keep your vital signs normal

  • Create items from improvised materials, dress the character according to the weather, so as not to get sick

  • An easy-to-understand character skill system
